modName: White Plains Cabin Player Home (Western Watch Tower Ruin Home Fix)
summary: Are you tired of Whiterun's Broken House near the Western Watch Tower? Well here, I have re-created an idea to make it a player home for you to enjoy!
descriptionHtml:
DOWNLOAD VERSION 1.2!
I have fixed the interior to match the exterior, followed suggestions to create a Blacksmithing area which is located right infront of the home.
Unfortunately, I am unable to replace the hidden chest that was found under the ruined home, I had attempted to copy and paste it back into my file, but that didn't seem to work, if you have any more suggestions, please tell me!!
Also there is still no fix on the Followers getting trapped inside the house, or just don't follow you outside, I don't think there's much I can do about that!
Thanks!
~~

Are you tired of Whiterun's Broken House near the Western Watch Tower? Well here, I have re-created an idea to make it a player home for you to enjoy!

This MOD replaces the destroyed house near the Western Whiterun Watch Tower, it has it's own location so you can fast travel to it. Contains cows, many chickens, a rain catcher tank for decoration (has no use Lol) and a stable for your horse. Also includes an outdoor long table to drink your mead!
NEW~ Black-smith area!

The inside of the house is very small but useful, contains a few safe containers to store items, 2 beds, alchemy lab and some furniture items for decoration. There are no fancy decorations or weapon plaques, armor mannequins, etc. as I am quite a new and inexperienced modder so please keep that in mind! :)

Requirements:
None, just Vanilla Skyrim with the latest patch.


Thank you!

~Thank you so much to everyone that gave suggestions!!~


DoodleBugRain
author: DoodleBugRain

files.name: White Plain Cabin Player Home
files.changelogHtml:
Completely changed the interior of the home.
Added Blacksmithing area.
